name: GSS_OCA_Tarifador
author: GlobalSaas Solutions

sections.description: This plug gets the value of a shipment via OCA Argentina. Based on the items size and weight the plug in will arrange the items into the best fitting boxes to reduce the shipping value. This value will be calculated via OCA e-pack web service with the customer postal code and the user postal code configured in globalsaas.com web page. In order to secure your personal data, and keeping in mind that this plug in is part of a bigger ERP system (Still in development), your personal data is retrieved from our servers and all the items data (Weight and size) will be sent to our servers in order to secure your personal data, and keeping in mind that this plug in is part of a bigger ERP system (Still in development), your personal data is retrieved from our servers and all the items data (Weight and size) will be sent to our servers in order to calculate the shipping cost via OCA Web service.
sections.installation:
1. Upload GSS_OCA_Tarifador.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the WooCommerce Settings Page
  4. Access Shipping Tab
  5. Select “OCA E-Pak”
  6. Write your Serial Number in order to activate your free licence.
  7. Activate the shipping methods you’d like to use
sections.faq:
I can’t See my Oca shipping methods

Check that you are using the proper Serial number, Also make sure you added the proper Shipping code numbers at globalsaas.com

short_description: Obtain OCA shipping rates dynamically via OCA E-Pak Web Service. Automatically calculate and fetch OCA shipping rates using WooCommerce.
